entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then clearing. Amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:02 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Wind light except north 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 6:02 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
